description.fr:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Invoque un {Summoning:79} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
 {%Attack} Rejoue son tour s'il est {PropertyEffect:82}.
description.en:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Summons one surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> {Summoning:79}.
\---
 {%Attack} Replays turn if he is {PropertyEffect:82}.
description.es:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Invoca un {Summoning:79} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
 {%Attack} Vuelve a jugar su turno si está {PropertyEffect:82}.
description.de:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Beschwört 1\_{Summoning:79} in der Nähe\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
 {%Attack} Spielt seine Runde erneut, wenn er {PropertyEffect:82} ist.
description.pt:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Invoca um {Summoning:79} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
\---
 {%Attack} Joga um turno extra se ele estiver {PropertyEffect:82}.
